parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post contains a CMF number: "CMF: 11240027". This strongly suggests electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions "Partidul S.O.S. România" (SOS party) and its position on the ballot (#9) and promotes voting for them in the parliamentary elections. It also mentions Celin Georgescu, but in the context of the presidential elections, which is not the focus of the analysis.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The message is not a private communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support the SOS party in the parliamentary elections. The call to action ("Votăm Partidul S.O.S. România la Parlamentare") is a clear indication of this intent.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a promotional message advocating for a specific political party, not an informative or analytical piece.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes for a specific party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>594468426393957</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a specific candidate (SOS party), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the exact end date is not specified, the post's existence suggests it's within the campaign period), has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes for SOS), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The presence of a CMF number further reinforces this conclusion.  The fact that it's a paid Facebook advertisement targeting a large audience strengthens the case for it being electoral propaganda.  While it mentions a presidential candidate, the primary focus and call to action are clearly directed towards the parliamentary elections.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Partidul S.O.S. România</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>ALVERNA CONNECT SRL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
ALVERNA CONNECT SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID: 594468426393957), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează Partidul S.O.S. România pentru alegerile parlamentare, menționând poziția lor pe buletinul de vot (#9) și îndemnând la vot ("Votăm Partidul S.O.S. România la Parlamentare").  Postarea conține un număr CMF (11240027), indicând clar natura sa de propagandă electorală.  Efectul electoral este evident, având ca obiectiv influențarea voturilor în favoarea partidului menționat.  Chemarea la acțiune directă, combinată cu bugetul alocat reclamei (sub 100 RON, conform datelor din Ad Library) și o estimare a audienței de peste 1 milion de persoane, demonstrează intenția clară de a influența rezultatul alegerilor.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
